case_title: United States of America v. Fife et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Fife et al

charges.charge_description: 26:7206(1) &; 18:2  FILING FALSE INCOME TAX RETURN; AIDING AND ABETTING(1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: 36 months imprisonment on Counts 1,2, and 3, followed by 1 year of supervised release, to be served concurrently. Restitution $384,840.00 to be paid directly to the Internal Revenue Service. Total Special Assessment $400.00

36 months imprisonment on Counts 1,2, and 3, followed by 1 year of supervised release, to be served concurrently. Restitution $384,840.00 to be paid directly to the Internal Revenue Service. Total Special Assessment $400.00

10 months imprisonment on Count 4, followed by 1 year of supervised release, to be served consecutively to the sentence on Counts 1,2, and 3. Restitution $384,840.00 to be paid directly to the Internal Revenue Service. Total Special Assessment $400.00

charges.charge_description: 26:7206(2)  AIDING/ASSISTING IN THE PREPARATION OF A FALSE INCOME TAX RETURN(5)

charges.charge_disposition: 24 months imprisonment followed by 1 year of supervised release. Restitution in the amount of $242,569.00 to be paid directly to the Internal Revenue Service. Special Assessment $100.00
